pr_title: [BEAM-8740] Remove unused dependency from Spark runner

timeline.message: [BEAM-8740] Remove unused dependency from Spark runner

timeline.bodyText: I had to add this one because it was not correctly categorized and VR were breaking
timeline.author: iemejia
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3736,6 +3736,7 @@ public void testTwoTimersSettingEachOtherWithCreateAsInput() {
       ValidatesRunner.class,
       UsesStatefulParDo.class,
       UsesTimersInParDo.class,
+      UsesTestStream.class,

replies.bodyText: Shouldn't the VR tests exclude UsesTestStreamWithOutputTimestamp?
replies.author: lukecwik

replies.bodyText: That's the line exactly below that one. Notice that Spark runner does not implement TestStream so we probably need to make the test belong to both categories.
replies.author: iemejia

replies.bodyText: Mind to maybe lgtm / merge this one @lukecwik. Seems most VR are broken because of it.
replies.author: iemejia

replies.bodyText: I see, I was under the impression that we would place things in the most appropriate category but now thinking about it makes sense to place it in this category as well.
replies.author: lukecwik
